about.title: About kokua
texts: We are a team of passionate professionals who believe in the power of technology to transform businesses and people's lives.

Founded in 2023, we continue to grow thanks to our commitment to innovation, excellence, and customer satisfaction. We are driven by the desire to create software that empowers our clients to achieve their goals and have a positive impact on their businesses.

At the heart of our agency is the concept of Kokua. Kokua is a Hawaiian word that means 'help' or 'service'. We believe that by embodying the spirit of Kokua, we can create software that not only meets our clients' needs but also exceeds their expectations.
